          <title>
            <string language="en">Industrial uses of electricity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Industrielle Gebräuche von Elektrizität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisations industrielles de l'électricité</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows several energy forms converted from electricity and their industrial uses.</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einige Energieformulare,

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre plusieurs formes

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra diversos formulários da
